perturbation.original_text: WHEREAS, Premier has an Exclusive License to the Issued Patents via an Agreement executed by Marv and Premier on May 12, 2010 ("2010 Agreement"). WHEREAS, Marv has subsequently filed numerous patent applications on subject matter related to the Issued Patents which are listed in Appendix A. WHEREAS, Marv and Premier expanded Premier's Exclusive License to include all the Applications listed in Appendix A via a Third Addendum to the 2010 Agreement executed by Marv and Premier on the Effective Date ("2020 Agreement").
perturbation.changed_text: WHEREAS, Premier has an Exclusive License to the Issued Patents via an Agreement executed by Marv and Premier on May 12, 2010 ("2010 Agreement"). WHEREAS, Marv has subsequently filed numerous patent applications on subject matter related to the Issued Patents which are listed in Appendix A. WHEREAS, Marv and Premier expanded Premier's Exclusive License to include all the Applications listed in Appendix A via a Third Addendum to the 2010 Agreement executed by Marv and Premier on the Effective Date ("Supplemental Agreement").
perturbation.explanation: Changing '2020 Agreement' to 'Supplemental Agreement' creates confusion. The contract repeatedly refers to the '2010 Agreement/2020 Agreement' as the basis for licensing rights. If 'Supplemental Agreement' replaces '2020 Agreement' in one place, it's unclear whether all references to the '2010 Agreement/2020 Agreement' still apply to this 'Supplemental Agreement'. This introduces ambiguity regarding the scope of licensed rights.

perturbation.original_text: (e) If THI does not make the obligatory payments as stated in 2(b) by the dates stated, the Exclusive License will revert back to Premier. 3. JOINT VENTURE (a) Premier and THI will jointly cooperate in developing Covid-19 Licensed Products, to be memorialized by them in a Technology Acquisition and Financing Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: (e) If THI does not make the obligatory payments as stated in 2(b) by the dates stated, the Exclusive License will revert back to Premier. 3. BUSINESS ALLIANCE (a) Premier and THI will jointly cooperate in developing Covid-19 Licensed Products, to be memorialized by them in a Technology Acquisition and Financing Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text calls the agreement between THI and Premier a “Joint Venture”. Changing this to “Business Alliance” creates uncertainty. Is a “Business Alliance” legally equivalent to a “Joint Venture”? Different legal rules may apply. Later references to the 'Joint Venture' become ambiguous - do they still apply, or is the alliance now governed by a different set of rules?

perturbation.original_text: 8. VENUE. This Agreement and the rights of the Parties hereunder shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania including all matters of construction, validity, performance, and enforcement and without giving effect to the principles of conflict of laws. Venue for any action brought under this Agreement shall be in the appropriate court in Mercer County, Pennsylvania.
perturbation.changed_text: 8. VENUE. This Agreement and the rights of the Parties hereunder shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania excluding all matters of construction, validity, performance, and enforcement and without giving effect to the principles of conflict of laws. Venue for any action brought under this Agreement shall be in the appropriate court in Mercer County, Pennsylvania.
perturbation.explanation: The modification of the sentence from 'including' to 'excluding' creates a contradiction in the governing law. It is not clearly outlined what will define construction, validity, performance, and enforcement. As a result, any actions that could have been brought, may not be valid under this new agreement.
